text: Can anyone offer any insight into how to resolve this error I get after running `hs init` for a new project? I was able to successfully create my config file yesterday for a different project, but for some reason the same steps aren't working for this new project. I am new to the hs-cli and any help would be greatly appreciated!

Sorry you are running into the noted error above with personal access keys not refreshing. I think a change on our end with some accounts that were enrolled in a beta caused this to occur. To resolve this error, you will need to deactivate and re-create you personal access key. You can go to <https://app.HubSpot.com/l/personal-access-key> to deactivate your existing key, and then can run `hs auth personalaccesskey` to update your configuration file with a newly generated key.
It looks like you might also be on an older version of the CLI, if you run `npm install -g @HubSpot/cms-cli` you should get an updated version
I think this is likely the issue for you as well <https://HubSpotdev.slack.com/archives/CLJJXGTC0/p1586529840117000?thread_ts=1586527514.115000&cid=CLJJXGTC0>
<@U6W3H6YN8> Thanks! This resolved the issue I was experiencing. I appreciate you taking the time to help troubleshoot!
